TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyboardInputProviderAcquireFocusEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks The KeyboardInputProviderAcquireFocusEventArgs class is used to notify elements before and after keyboard focus is acquired through a keyboard input provider.
